questions.question_text: Which statement about extended access lists is true?
questions.answer: D. Extended access lists perform filtering that is based on source and destination and are most effective when applied to the source

discussion.content: D. Extended access lists perform filtering that is based on source and destination and are most effective when applied to the source

choices.A: Extended access lists perform filtering that is based on source and are most effective when applied to the destination
choices.C: Extended access lists perform filtering that is based on destination and are most effective when applied to the source
choices.B: Extended access lists perform filtering that is based on source and destination and are most effective when applied to the destination

questions.answer_ET: D. Extended access lists perform filtering that is based on source and destination and are most effective when applied to the source

questions.question_text: What are the primary attack methods of VLAN hopping? (Choose two)
What is the default timeout interval during which a router waits for responses from a TACACS server before declaring a timeout failure?

questions.answer: D. Issue the command anyconnect keep-installer under the group policy or username webvpn mode

discussion.content:
Answer is A
To enable the permanent installation of an SSL VPN client on a remote PC, use the anyconnect keep-installer command in group-policy webvpn or username webvpn configuration mode. To remove the command from the configuration and cause the value to be inherited, use the no form of this command.

anyconnect keep-installer { installed | none }
no anyconnect keep-installer { installed | none }

Syntax Description:
installed - Disables the automatic uninstalling feature of the client. The client remains installed on the remote PC for future connections.
none - Specifies that the client uninstalls from the remote computer after the active connection terminates.

questions.answer_ET: D. Issue the command anyconnect keep-installer under the group policy or username webvpn mode

choices.A: Issue the command anyconnect keep-installer installed under the group policy or username webvpn mode
choices.C: Issue the command anyconnect keep-installer under the group policy or username webvpn mode
choices.B: Issue the command anyconnect keep-installer installed in the global configuration

questions.question_text: What is the FirePOWER impact flag used for?

choices.A: A value that measures the application awreness
choices.C: A value that sets the priority of a signature
choices.B: A value that indicates the potential severity of an attack.

questions.answer: D. A value that the administrator assigns to each signature
